for z in range(int(input())):
    (n, p) = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    s = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    s.sort()
    P_S = []
    for l in range(len(s) - 1, len(s) - p - 1, -1):
        P_S.append(s[l])
    P_S.sort()
    print(P_S[0] - 1)

def find_max_passing_mark(n, x, scores):
    sorted_scores = sorted(scores, reverse=True)
    x_score = sorted_scores[x - 1]
    passing_mark = max(0, x_score - 1)
    print(passing_mark)
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, x) = map(int, input().split())
    scores = list(map(int, input().split()))
    find_max_passing_mark(n, x, scores)

    passed = max(marks) - 1
    print(passed)

def code():
    cases = int(input())
    for _ in range(cases):
        (num_students, num_passed) = map(int, input().split(' '))
        marks = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
        marks.sort(reverse=True)
        sorted_marks = marks
        passed_scores = []
        for i in range(num_passed):
            passed_scores.append(sorted_marks[i])
        min_passed_score = min(passed_scores)
        passing_mark = min_passed_score - 1
        print(passing_mark)
code()

def code():
    cases = int(input())
    for _ in range(cases):
        (num_students, num_passed) = map(int, input().split(' '))
        marks = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
        marks.sort(reverse=True)
        sorted_marks = marks
        passed_scores = []
        for i in range(num_passed):
            passed_scores.append(sorted_marks[i])
        min_passed_score = min(passed_scores)
        passing_mark = min_passed_score - 1
        print(passing_mark)
code()
